item.title: Pytest Environment Variables
item.description: How would you? … in my opinion 🧐 Writing test for code can quickly go out of hand if there are a huge number of conditions in the code, which in general there is. I recently came across such a situation where my code was 200 lines and the tests I wrote for it were 400 lines 🙈. I know it was too much but I have this practice where in I want to have 100% of test coverage.
